pages.text: $(italic)In the meantime, you have come into possession of many new materials. It's time to take a close look at each of them to see what effect they have on your potions.$(br)Your educated guess, as an expert: Awesome!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Instead of Blaze Powder, the Potion Workshop runs on Mermaids Gems. The main advantage of this is that you don't have to manually fill your bottles with water.

pages.title: Using Reagents
pages.text: The Base of Mermaids Gems allows you to add a wide range of additional magical ingredients to your Potions. Each of those Reagents modifies the resulting properties of your Potions. Each Reagent can only be used once per recipe.

pages.title: Mermaids Gems
pages.text: Instead of supplying Water Bottles you can also just add $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaids Gems$(/l) to the designated slot and use empty Bottles instead.

pages.title: Reagent: Redstone
pages.text: Doubles Duration

pages.title: Reagent: Glowstone
pages.text: Increases Potency

pages.title: Reagent: Gunpowder
pages.text: Creates Splash Potions

pages.title: Reagent: Dragons Breath
pages.text: Creates Lingering Potions - also requires Gunpowder as reagent$(br2)Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Water Bottles

pages.title: Reagent: Topaz
pages.text: Makes Effects not show any particles

pages.title: Reagent: Amethyst
pages.text: Adds a short flat bonus to the Potions Duration

pages.title: Reagent: Citrine
pages.text: Slight flat Potency bonus

pages.title: Reagent: Onyx
pages.text: Adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable.$(br)Also makes its color completely black.

pages.title: Reagent: Moonstone
pages.text: Changes all otherwise negative Effects to their positive ones

pages.title: Reagent: Shimmerstone
pages.text: Tiny multiplicative bonus to both Duration and Potency

pages.title: Reagent: Quitoxic Powder
pages.text: Increases Potency of all negative Effects by flat +1

pages.title: Reagent: Crimtane
pages.text: Flat +1 bonus to all Effects Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect

pages.title: Reagent: Paltaeria
pages.text: Adds a random positive Effect

pages.title: Reagent: Stardust
pages.text: $(italic)Absorbs the last drops of what remains of your previous brew.$()$(br2)Small chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously

pages.title: Reagent: Star Fragment
pages.text: $(italic)Similar to Stardust, but much more potent.$()$(br2)Guaranteed chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously, at slightly decreased Potency

pages.title: Reagent: Storm Stone
pages.text: Increases the Potions Potency at the beginning, but wearing off fast over time

pages.title: Reagent: Azurite
pages.text: Decreases the duration penalty for Splash and Lingering Potions as well as for Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Reagent: Clover
pages.text: Provides a huge boost to a random stat

pages.title: Reagent: Vegetal
pages.text: Doubles the potions Duration at the cost of their Potency

pages.title: Reagent: Neolith
pages.text: Increases Yield, allowing you to brew an additional potion

pages.title: Reagent: Bedrock Dust
pages.text: Doubles the Potions Potency, at the cost of Duration
